website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a unique shower curtain, it's a good choice, but its design isn't for everyone.
pros: Sports a ruffled design that adds texture and a retro look
cons: The material has a thin feel, and it's too frilly for some tastes

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE it!! I'm extremely picky when it comes to picking decor for my house. I was skeptical about purchasing this because there wasn't enough pics for me to know for sure if it would look right. This was the only shower curtain that could really bring texture into my bathroom as well as that romantic flair I wanted. I took a bit of a risk and it was well worth it! My only issue is that I noticed a couple tiny black stains on it. Other than that I'm extremely pleased with how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Glamour on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 days. I LOVE this shower curtain. Very pretty and well made. Put it in the dryer to take out the wrinkles...bam...It's perfect. I have bought 2 other curtains, 3rd times a charm. Its pretty girly but my husband said he likes it too. Would definitely buy again. I am not getting paid for this review. I know how important honest reviews are when your spending your money. If your looking for glamour on a budget, this is your curtain I have provided pics. I got mine in white. It is a true white.
customer_reviews.author: MsSievers

customer_reviews.title: $30 for a very defective product.
customer_reviews.text: Paid good money for these shower curtains. They have stitching threads and tails hanging all over the place. Total of 14 defects that I have found, so far. Contacted the company, all they recommend was to cut off the threads. When you do this the whole stich seam begins to unravel. Poor workmanship. Material seems good and they look nice, except they are falling apart. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Roger E. Horton Esq

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer :)
customer_reviews.text: This is beautifully different from any other boring shower curtain. Since it's fairly sheer, it lets a lot of light into an otherwise dimly lit shower. This seller- Home Bargains Plus provides top notch customer service! There was a slight mix up (not the sellers fault) but they responded to my emails almost immediately and went above and beyond to rectify it. Purchase with confidence from this seller... They are reliable and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: YmaAmy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My item arrived was nothing like picture shown online..thin not cascading
customer_reviews.author: Mrs wick

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived today and it’s already hung! Love the classic yet modern clean look. It is still pretty wrinkled from being in the box but it looks like the wrinkles will either fall out or I can steam this to smooth it out from. Love the white which goes well with my white bedding in the master guest space. And while it is sheer it still is private enough to not see everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Looks so cheap
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap. Looks terrible and cheap. Completely see through not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Love2bhappy

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt look like picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture sold me. I got the shower curtain and hung it up and man it looked so cheap and thin. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: missmargo

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed with this curtain as it looks nothing like the picture! The quality of the material is poor, and the ruffles look nothing like the full pattern seen in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Great
customer_reviews.text: The ruffles are definitely not as full as pictured in the photo (I guess because in the photo it is bunched together). It's also very see-through. I had to buy another white liner to put underneath. Definitely not worth what I paid. More like $12-15. But overall I do like the look so I'm keeping the item.
customer_reviews.author: Philly_Nurse

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely not as high end looking as the picture, still a pretty decent knock off though. I will say that this is SUUUPER THIN!! I ended up using two plastic liners to stiffen I up a bit. A translucent one to keep inside of the bath, and a white one that hangs with this one. All in all, it got the job done. Its definitely worth the money you spend. I think my bathroom decor really set the look off.. ehh not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jumanne

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the holes don't get any bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shower curtain but it had several small holes throughout the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Does not look anything like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This polyester curtain is just four inch strips of fabric sewn to a larger panel, no ruffle at all, the fabric is too stiff to fold down into the soft delicate ruffles as shown in the picture and look roughly like line flags sticking straight out of the fabric. The fabric is thin, stiff, and coarse. Not a keeper. I have not noticed any leaking of water through the curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Best

customer_reviews.title: ... would look in my bathroom but it turned out beautiful. For those of you that are perfectionists that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried how it would look in my bathroom but it turned out beautiful. For those of you that are perfectionists that like to waste hours of your life ironing...my cheap hand steamer took 12 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lboogie827

customer_reviews.title: Thin, flimsy and sheer. You will have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Thin, flimsy and sheer. You will have to use a white liner or white shower curtain behind it because it’s see through. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this shower curtain, I may order a second one just so I can have the same fullness as it appears in pics when pushed back. It is lovely, well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: SherryB2001

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to go with this one and not a more expensive option. I am very pleased with the look. The quality is ok for a shower curtain, I mean, it’s not high end quality for hotels, there are threads hanging here and there but they don’t contribute negatively to the overall look anyway. The manufacturer should take a note on a better quality control, though
customer_reviews.author: K&A Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, it really completes my bathroom! Exactly how pictured. Surprisingly never really gets dirty, you can spot treat. I purchased a white shower curtain to go behind it so no one can see in the shower & there's no mess. Very happy with my purchase & would def buy again. Very beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I love this style but curtain I received did not have enough rows of fabric ..... looked very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off
customer_reviews.text: This has to be a knock-off..came rolled up in an amazon bag..no tags, no product bag...looks nothing like the picture, which looks full of ruffles. Just saw same curtain on Wayfair for 69.00..u get what u pay for..
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful (but put a fabric liner behind it)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shabby chic shower curtain ..... dramatic, romantic, fluffy, airy (needs a white liner behind it), perfect for a small bathroom. It came packaged in a box and did not require ironing — it is not supposed to be 100% wrinkle free and after it is hanging for a day or two, there are less wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Delicate & feminine
customer_reviews.text: Delicate and romantic shower curtain. It is sheer, even with a liner behind it, which is precisely my preference. The material is lightweight in texture. I would only wash this on a hand wash setting, and hang to dry. I adore the way the ruffles are verticle and it feels like I’m playing with an “air” element in the room I bathe. It just makes me happy whenever I pass it by. 🥰😃
customer_reviews.author: Candis

customer_reviews.title: Ruffled Shower Curtain...
customer_reviews.text: I love the style, but there are definitely not enough ruffles.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Rich people curtains!
customer_reviews.text: Bay bee! When I tell you!!!!! Every person who steps through my doors and go to use my bathroom complements my on my shower curtains! It just makes me feel like a queen so sassy yet sophisticated! You will not be regretful, and they make you look rich, and well all want to look rich!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bri'Yanna

customer_reviews.title: Light, airy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower curtain! It is slightly sheer, exactly what I wanted. It adds a light and airy feel to my small bathroom. The picture made it look a bit fuller than it was when i hung it. I feel like it will smooth and fluff up a bit after it hangs a couple days. All in all, exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: It came crammed in a tiny package. Literally the size of my hand stuffed in there. Doesn’t really look like the picture with the swirls coming down. More lays flat but it’s still cute i guess
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture and I was pleased with the curtain
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the picture and I was pleased with the curtain. I would recommend getting a white liner to go with it, because it is see through.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Visionary Mind
customer_reviews.text: Well it was supposed to be a Shower Curtain and as you can see it was TOO short for a Shower Curtain but I used my visionary mind and this is what I done with The Shower Curtain and Valance I ordered from you. Both where Very Sheer but it worked out Fine by the time I got finished with the both pieces that were ordered.
customer_reviews.author: MARY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: *REVIEW* *REVIEW*
customer_reviews.text: So I’ll Start By Saying “My Review” is The Only One You Need To Read Cause Ima Let You Know. I Love It , It Big , It’s Poofy and It’s a Bit Smushed as well , So Try And Fluff Your Curtains a Bit , It’s Kinda Thin So Get a Shower Curtain liner Behind it To Fill It In .. Even Go as Far As Getting Some House Curtains And Buy a Tieback for That Drapery Look .. But You’ll Need a Extra Shower Rod for that Look Overall Very Cute Curtains , Durable , Longevity ? *With Kids .. Maybe 3 Months
customer_reviews.author: Di Di Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed in this. I ordered white and received an ivory one that had a white tag on it . It literally was almost pale yellow . Sent it back .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Look
customer_reviews.text: It is not as frilly as it appears in the picture-I wish it was-but coupled with another shower curtain, it gives the bathroom a soft warmth and appealing touch.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Item NOT as pictured!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was not full like the picture showed. It’s super thin and doesn’t have the cute “waves” that the picture showed. Very misleading. Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janay Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Its a little sheer. But for the price it was worth it. I just got a white liner to put behind it so its not sheer. But itsbpretty and worth the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Upon looking at other reviewers personal pictures, I noticed that they're easy to see through and they weren't very full. Although I knew that I would be putting a shower liner behind it, I still wanted the full effect. So, although one fit my shower perfectly, I decided to buy two. I'm super happy that I did because it gave me that perfectly full look that I was looking for!! Very classy look for my newly chic remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Savy mom of two

customer_reviews.title: I’d you close it across the entire length of the shower curtain it doesn’t look every nice.
customer_reviews.text: It’s oretty, but needs to be wider, or need to get multiple curtains if you want it to have the full cascading affect. I’d you close it across the entire length of the shower curtain it doesn’t look every nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Lara

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a 00 in every category. It cannot be used because there are no holes to use on the shower rod and it comes into pieces it’s not one full curtain length do not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Tami bonner

customer_reviews.title: Great style poor material
customer_reviews.text: Very sad about this product. I love the style but the material is cheaply and will collect dirt easily and if you try to wash it with bleach it still will not come out.
customer_reviews.author: Sun ☀️

customer_reviews.title: Not like I thought they would look
customer_reviews.text: Ok product. I thought from the picture they would be more fancy. They are definitely not waterproof and the ruffles are very far apart from eachother.
customer_reviews.author: Cc2003

customer_reviews.title: Tacky looking
customer_reviews.text: I'm soooo dissapointed, I was so excited to put this in my bathroom. It looks so tacky up and it looks cheaply made. Strands of thread everywhere. Since I already put it up, don't think I can return. Oh well, I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Liz J.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: This has a very unique look to it, definitely recommend to anyone who’s thinking of buying
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of length.
customer_reviews.text: Love shabby chic products but this was way short for my tub. Couldn’t use. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kyle F

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and fluffy and exactly like it is pictured here
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this item. It's longer than I expected but I would rather have it too long than too short. Be prepared to raise your shower curtain rod. It's nice and fluffy and exactly like it is pictured here. I love it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Deidra

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I get many compliments on this. Super cute. Bright white. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curtain for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this curtain as a backdrop for an outdoor wall. I wasn't expecting much for the price but it was perfect and so pretty! Beautiful ruffles and they held up in a downpour so I'd say they'd be great for a shower :)
customer_reviews.author: Chesky M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful once it’s fluffed out. Idk about water absorption I keep two liners between fabric shower curtains. But it’s nice
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Chic Shower Curtain
customer_reviews.text: I stayed in a B&B where I first saw this shower curtain an I loved it so much I needed it for my place. So chic...♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a waterfall cascading down
customer_reviews.text: I am not usually a frilly type women. But this shower curtain is simply lovely. though it's white reminds me of waterfalls . Love it and it isn't too much frilly as I would say...lovely looking. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Material is good quality. I ordered 2 for my shower because I didnt care for the look of 1 and wanted a more condensed ruffle look. I am thrilled with 2 put together. Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Layton

customer_reviews.title: Ummm try again sis!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like this. It's very spaced (ruffles are far apart) the bottom doesn't hang like this at all... to the trash it goes!

customer_reviews.title: The looks is not the same as picture
customer_reviews.text: Too clear and looks not well made missing the magnet in one side and looks uneven on I’m so sad

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a better fabric. More like a soft cloth but its more papery type and thin feeling. Not exactly what i wanted but it works
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my shabby chic bathroom, it's a little see through so if you don't like that I suggest getting a white liner, I personally love it.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Cheaply made but only if you look up close!

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty. It comes a little wrinkled but I expected that. The wrinkles disappear after a few days. Very nice for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Great shabby chic curtain
customer_reviews.text: Great shabby chic shower curtain. It does require a shower liner, material is very see-through, not water resistant.

customer_reviews.title: Chii
customer_reviews.text: Love them can’t wait to hang them up will post pictures

customer_reviews.title: Cute

customer_reviews.title: Elegant shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower curtain!! Do much so that I bought a second one!

customer_reviews.title: Chic
customer_reviews.text: Not as “fluffy” as the photo but it’s still pretty. Not as long as I expected but I also didn’t measure so not the seller’s fault. Gonna order a second one to get the full look

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the shower curtain! It’s very cute and looks very chic. It is see thru so a white liner behind is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. I may however have to buy one more just for the the fullness. Not quite as full as I was hoping. Still very happy with the look it gives off in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Transparent Material
customer_reviews.text: I do like this shower curtain. It is pretty but was shocked at the transparency of the material. And yes of course I have a waterproof liner behind it!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not as full as the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as full as they appear in the product pictures, but still beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Love

customer_reviews.text: It looked so great in the picture, not in my bathroom though.

customer_reviews.text: I love this shower curtain. It was 80.00 on other sites. It's perfect. It looks just like the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shower curtain almost two years ago and I’m still in love!!! It reminds me of a beautiful wedding dress, I’ve received so many compliments, I’m purchasing two more for my new home!

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the curtain! Very girly, it’s see through so I bought a bright pink shower liner.

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely Love this shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely Love this shower curtain! We remodeled our bathroom and found this to be the perfect finishing touch. Hopfully the attached photos will help show that it is made with excellent quality. We appreciate the liner behind the ruffles that give it a clean solid look rather than a see through appearance. Well worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Im satisfied with this great product

product_meta.title: Cascade Shabby Chic Ruffled Sheer Shower Curtain (White)
product_meta.description: This standard shower curtain is made of polyester fabric, which is waterproof and soft.It can be washed by machine with the room temperature water.I believe this shower curtain will make your bathroom more comfortable.
feature_bullets: Cascading vertical ruffled layers give your bathroom a retro look-Ruffled voile shower curtain is machine washable
Cascade Shabby Chic Ruffled Sheer Shower Curtain 1st Quality –White
70" wide x 72" Long - With Vinyl  Reinforced Header

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars513 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
